content.raw:
Team UF, we’re running some quick tests as a sanity check and I noticed that your team Docker image exits right away after executing `docker run ...` . I’m testing with the stationkeeping task. 

‌

```
caguero@frost:~/vrx-docker$ docker ps -a
CONTAINER ID        IMAGE                              COMMAND                  CREATED             STATUS                      PORTS               NAMES
8d927d01e608        ufmil/vrx:phase2_submission        "/bin/bash"              19 seconds ago      Exited (0) 18 seconds ago                       vrx-competitor-system
a920fc6b7eb1        vrx-server-melodic-nvidia:latest   "/vrx_entrypoint.sh …"   28 seconds ago      Up 27 seconds               11345/tcp           vrx-server-system
```

Is your image supposed to automatically execute your entry point?
